container.bread.title: The Bubbles
origin.tsmp_origins.adventurous_spirit.d: You never really sat still for very long. You desire to see the world in a different light which has pushed to to explore.
power.tsmp_origins.adventurous_spirit/aq: Comfortable in most situations, you have Dolphin's Grace when underwater.
power.tsmp_origins.adventurous_spirit/li: You can not wear any heavy armor (armor with protection values higher than chainmail).
power.tsmp_origins.adventurous_spirit/me: You barely deal any damage with swords and axes.
power.tsmp_origins.adventurous_spirit/no: You're used to running around and jumping off things. You can not take fall damage.
power.tsmp_origins.adventurous_spirit/ru: Always on the move, you have become quicker than most.
power.tsmp_origins.adventurous_spirit/we: I've Got Your Back, from Back Here
You have trained to be on the move. You are weaker than most in a combat situation.
power.tsmp_origins.adventurous_spirit/wi: You've mastered being able to adjust your body when jumping that you are able to almost fly.
origin.tsmp_origins.bardic_phoenix.name: Bardic Phoenix
power.tsmp_origins.bardic_phoenix/brittl: You take more damage from falling and flying into blocks.
power.tsmp_origins.bardic_phoenix/cold_h: When in a cold environment you're majorly slowed and Weakness II is applied.
power.tsmp_origins.bardic_phoenix/dislik: You hate the water, gaining Slowness and Weakness.
power.tsmp_origins.bardic_phoenix/flame_: Your body is made up of flames, so it can set enemies on fire just by your punches and you have flames around you.
power.tsmp_origins.bardic_phoenix/heat_a: When in hot biomes, you thrive and grow in power.
power.tsmp_origins.bardic_phoenix/light_: You can not wear any heavy armor (armor with protection values higher than chainmail).
power.tsmp_origins.bardic_phoenix/second: When you're supposed to die your phoenix spirit will grant you totem-like effects.
power.tsmp_origins.bardic_phoenix/tea_fa: You don't go ANYWHERE without your trusty copper kettle.
power.tsmp_origins.bardic_phoenix/why.de: You can't use totems cause why should you? You're a phoenix, you'll be fine!
power.tsmp_origins.bardic_phoenix/winged: You have Elytra wings without needing to equip any.
origin.tsmp_origins.bread.name: Bread
origin.tsmp_origins.bread.description: You are a bread, and you are bread.
power.tsmp_origins.bread/crisp_outside.d: Your golden brown crust, cooked to perfection, gives you a bit more protection.
power.tsmp_origins.bread/delicious.name: Delicious
power.tsmp_origins.bread/dense.name: Dense
power.tsmp_origins.bread/fluffy_inside.d: Bread is also soft and fluffy so you can survive falls from any height. :D
power.tsmp_origins.bread/fragile.name: Fragile
power.tsmp_origins.bread/small.name: Smol
power.tsmp_origins.bread/small.descripti: You are smol...like a dinner roll.
You stale over time. You can remove staling by holding a water bucket in your offhand.
power.tsmp_origins.bread/the_bubbles.des: No one truly knows what exists in the bubbles of break. Legend has it that breads can store things in them though. But that's just crazy talk, right?
origin.tsmp_origins.bnuuy.name: Bnuuy
origin.tsmp_origins.bnuuy.description: Some say this bunny just likes to bake; but we know better than that. Better keep your kneecaps protected from this bnuuy.
power.tsmp_origins.bnuuy/cookie_master.d: Your mastery of the baking arts allows you to make sugar cookies with ease.
power.tsmp_origins.bnuuy/fast_mine.name: Bnuuy Paws
power.tsmp_origins.bnuuy/fast_mine.descr: Bnuuies are great diggers, and you can mine faster than most.
power.tsmp_origins.bnuuy/favorite_food.d: Your favorite food is cookies and you get more nutrition from them...somehow?
power.tsmp_origins.bnuuy/jump_boost.name: Bnuuy Feet
power.tsmp_origins.bnuuy/jump_boost.desc: Bnuuies are great jumpers, and you can jump higher than most. You also don't take fall damage.
A master with cooking and baking tools of all kinds to the point that they are all a deadly weapon in your widdle paws.
power.tsmp_origins.bnuuy/nimble.name: Nimble
power.tsmp_origins.bnuuy/nimble.descript: You are able to avoid the more prickly aspects of nature.
power.tsmp_origins.bnuuy/pounce.name: Bnuuy Hop
power.tsmp_origins.bnuuy/pounce.descript: You can leap in the direction you're looking.
power.tsmp_origins.bnuuy/slow_swimmer.de: You're not a fan of the water so you swim a bit slower than most.
power.tsmp_origins.bnuuy/sugar_expert.de: You don't take damage from sweet berry bushes.
power.tsmp_origins.bnuuy/weak.name: Small Frame
power.tsmp_origins.bnuuy/weak.descriptio: Your heath is reduced to 7 hearts. You are also smaller than most.
origin.tsmp_origins.dwagon.name: Dwagon
origin.tsmp_origins.dwagon.description: You are a dragon who has an affinity for math rocks.
power.tsmp_origins.dwagon/born_in_fire.d: Having spent most of your life around fire, you have grown steadly immune to fire damage.
power.tsmp_origins.dwagon/lava_breath.de: You can shoot a lava fireball.
power.tsmp_origins.dwagon/light_armor.de: You can not wear any heavy armor (armor with protection values higher than chainmail).
power.tsmp_origins.dwagon/natural_streng: Your draconic blood gives you extra strength.
power.tsmp_origins.dwagon/slow_swim.name: Slow Swimmer
power.tsmp_origins.dwagon/slow_swim.desc: If you have to get in the water, you can do it, but you're not going to like it.
power.tsmp_origins.dwagon/slowness_in_co: You have a pretty high internal temperature, but you can't really handle the cold very well.
power.tsmp_origins.dwagon/winged.name: Winged
power.tsmp_origins.dwagon/winged.descrip: You are able to fly without equipping an Elytra.
origin.tsmp_origins.elephant.name: Elephant
power.tsmp_origins.elephant/heavy_body.d: Due to your great weight you can barely jump a block high.
power.tsmp_origins.elephant/large_appeti: Because your body now requires more energy, causing you to eat more often.
power.tsmp_origins.elephant/ram.name: Charge
power.tsmp_origins.elephant/ram.descript: You're able to lunge forward at a high speed. Attacking something while lunging at it will deal extra damage and knock it into the air.
power.tsmp_origins.elephant/slowness.des: Your draconic blood gives you extra strength.
power.tsmp_origins.elephant/toughness.de: Your natural bulk gives you increased health and armor.
origin.tsmp_origins.elven_adventurer.des: Definitely not a certain copyrighted individual represented by an absolutely terrifying organization.
power.tsmp_origins.elven_adventurer/brit: You take more damage from falling and flying into blocks.
power.tsmp_origins.elven_adventurer/clim: You are able to climb up any kind of wall, not just ladders.
power.tsmp_origins.elven_adventurer/dash: You are able to dash forward, giving you a chance to hit your enemies and knocking them back.
power.tsmp_origins.elven_adventurer/fast: You've spend so much time running and climbing that your body exhausts faster.
power.tsmp_origins.elven_adventurer/rela: Villagers recognize you as a their third cousin, four times removed, and thus lower their trade prices for you.
power.tsmp_origins.elven_adventurer/sink: You never learnt how to swim. Yep, that's canon now.
power.tsmp_origins.elven_adventurer/stro: You are able to jump higher by jumping while sprinting.
power.tsmp_origins.elven_adventurer/tail: You are a little bit quicker on foot than others.
power.tsmp_origins.elven_adventurer/trav: A wanderer always needs a trusty pouch with them. Be careful: You drop this inventory on death!
origin.tsmp_origins.ghost.name: Spoop
origin.tsmp_origins.ghost.description: You're a friendly spoop; or so they say.
power.tsmp_origins.ghost/displace.name: Displace
power.tsmp_origins.ghost/displace.descri: You can become invisible for a short while.
power.tsmp_origins.ghost/float.name: Float
power.tsmp_origins.ghost/float.descripti: You can float (but it's too exhausting to fly for long).
power.tsmp_origins.ghost/intangible.name: Intangible
power.tsmp_origins.ghost/intangible.desc: Automatically dodges the first attack you receive (with a cooldown).
power.tsmp_origins.ghost/scary.name: Spoopy
power.tsmp_origins.ghost/scary.descripti: You've spend so much time running and climbing that your body exhausts faster.
power.tsmp_origins.ghost/teleport.name: No Mortal Coil
power.tsmp_origins.ghost/teleport.descri: You can teleport wherever you want (within 90 blocks).
power.tsmp_origins.ghost/undead.name: Dead
